title: Unexpected compiler panic after restart
body: While compiling my system was shutdown due to mussing power, after rebooting the compiler kept crashing I tried this code: confidential, sadly I expected to see this happen: the compiler shouldnt panic Instead, this happened: .. the compiler paniced :D ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: rust:1.62-alpine docker container with volumes to the working dir (inkl. target) ``` rustc 1.62.0 (a8314ef7d 2022-06-27) binary: rustc commit-hash: a8314ef7d0ec7b75c336af2c9857bfaf43002bfc commit-date: 2022-06-27 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-musl release: 1.62.0 LLVM version: 14.0.5 ``` ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'attempted to read from stolen value: rustc_middle::mir::Body', compiler/rustc_mir_transform/src/check_unsafety.rs:517:36 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fdc2f14cadd - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h91d5e08ec83aa53b at /rustc/a8314ef7d0ec7b75c336af2c9857bfaf43002bfc/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7fdc2f14cadd - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::hc1e2a5f8ec1acff3 at /rustc/a8314ef7d0ec7b75c336af2c9857bfaf43002bfc/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x7fdc2f14cadd - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt::h399ef521e9cfa38c at /rustc/a8314ef7d0ec7b75c336af2c9857bfaf43002bfc/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:66:5 3: 0x7fdc2f14cadd - std::io::Write::write_fmt::h9efe861491665d4b at /rustc/a8314ef7d0ec7b75c336af2c9857bfaf43002bfc/library/std/src/io/mod.rs:1654:15 6: 0x7fdc2f14f7f5 - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print::h88be5589fe3d1a62 at /rustc/a8314ef7d0ec7b75c336af2c9857bfaf43002bfc/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:48:5 7: 0x7fdc2f14f7f5 - std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::h84b5f4d3c9057080 at /rustc/a8314ef7d0ec7b75c336af2c9857bfaf43002bfc/library/std/src/sys/unix/thread.rs:108:17 40: 0x7fdc385941f5 - error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.62.0 (a8314ef7d 2022-06-27) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-musl note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental -C target-feature=-crt-static note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [unsafety_check_result] unsafety-checking `http::handler::health::healthcheck` #1 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate end of query stack error: could not compile `` ```
